decks.notes: The main idea of this Gruul Aggro deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with aggressive creatures and direct damage spells. By utilizing cards like Monstrous Rage, Burst Lightning, and Reckless Rage, you can efficiently clear your opponent's board while building up your own with creatures like Soul-Scar Mage, Emberheart Challenger, and Manifold Mouse. This deck focuses on dealing damage quickly and efficiently to maintain board control and pressure your opponent into making unfavorable trades. With a mix of burn spells and aggressive creatures, this deck aims to win the game before the opponent has a chance to stabilize.

This Orzhov Aggro deck focuses on graveyard synergy and tribal synergy, utilizing creatures like Champion of the Perished and Wayward Servant to quickly build a board presence and drain the opponent's life total. The deck includes disruptive spells like Fatal Push and Thoughtseize to control the board and protect its threats. The inclusion of cards like Cryptbreaker and Relentless Dead allow for card advantage and recursion, keeping the pressure on the opponent. With a mix of aggressive creatures and removal spells, this deck aims to apply constant pressure and close out games quickly.

This Selesnya Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with efficient creatures and disruption spells. By utilizing cards like Archon of Emeria and Thalia, Guardian of Thraben, it aims to slow down the opponent's game plan while quickly building a board presence with creatures like Aven Interrupter and Skyclave Apparition. Collected Company provides additional creature advantage, while cards like Voice of Resurgence and Knight of Autumn offer flexibility and disruption. The deck aims to apply constant pressure and disrupt the opponent's strategy to secure a swift victory.

This Gruul Aggro deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with aggressive creatures and burn spells. The key strategy is to quickly deploy threats like Soul-Scar Mage, Heartfire Hero, and Emberheart Challenger to pressure the opponent while using spells like Burst Lightning and Reckless Rage to clear the opponent's blockers. The deck also includes mana acceleration with cards like Copperline Gorge and Questing Druid to quickly ramp into powerful threats. The combination of efficient creatures and burn spells makes this deck a fast and formidable force in Pioneer 1 vs 1 format.
